stories.text:
Most of the web focusses on the psychological side of Bitcoin. If hysteria will drive it to the moon or if fear will drive it into the ground. If it is the new gold or the new tulip mania.

Here on HN, we might have the unique opportunity to dicuss the future among technical people who actually understand the concepts behind cryptography and blockchains.

Maybe it would be cool if everybody made a prediction and put down their reasoning behind it? Then in 10 years we can look back on it and see how close or far we were from reality.
stories.title: Ask HN: What will be the price of Bitcoin in 10 years?
The Dumbest Pixel on the Internet

stories.text: This is an old annoyance regarding Chrome Dev Tools "Devices" toolbar. Can we please get an option to import and export device information (resolution, dpr, useragent, etc. - maybe even some nice device frames) for the Devices list in Devtools? I'm really curious about the logic behind deault choice of devices in the list: why are there no Pixel 6/6Pro (c'mon Google, promote your own devices, maybe!?), iPhone 13/Pro/Max (aka: latest devices, not ancient models)? And, what about "Show device frame"? Seems to only be available for some very old models (or Nesthubs - who needs to see that?). Sheesh.
stories.title: Chrome Dev Tools Team, can we please have import/export in the Devices list?
Using babashka with PHP: guestbook example
Building a High Performance Trading System in the Cloud
